sentences.sContent: Inherited deficiency of pyruvate kinase, a key glycolytic enzyme, causes ATP deficiency, which leads to reduced RBC life span and hemolytic anemia.
sentences.sContent_eng: Inherited deficiency of pyruvate kinase, a key glycolytic enzyme, causes ATP deficiency, which leads to reduced RBC life span and hemolytic anemia.
sentences.sCn: 糖酵解的关键酶--丙酮酸激酶，如果它有遗传缺陷，就导致会ATP缺乏、红细胞寿命缩短和溶血性贫血。

words.tran: [生理][免疫] 溶血（现象）；血细胞溶解
[生化] 溶血素，溶红血球素（等于haemolysin）

trans.tranOther: of or relating to the disintegration of red blood cells
